briefTitle: Prevalence of Lymphedema in Valle Del Cauca, Colombia.
officialTitle: Prevalence Of Upper Limb Lymphedema In Patients Diagnosed With Breast Cancer In A Valle Del Cauca Oncology Institution In A 2008-2020 Cohort In Colombia.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Unilateral breast cancer, cancer diagnosis between 2008-2020 in the oncology institution Colombia

Exclusion Criteria:

* Moving to a different institution for attention (other than Hemato-Oncólogos SA), unwillingness to become volunteer and death, bilateral breast cancer, congenital disease or trauma in the upper limb.
